title: Kobe As NBA Logo, Jazz-76ers, Fan Questions | WHAT’S BURNIN’ | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Kobe As NBA Logo, Jazz-76ers, Fan Questions | WHAT’S BURNIN’ | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
WHAT'S BURNIN' is back. Matt and Stephen discuss Kyrie Irving’s comments about making the NBA logo and talk about if it should happen. Plus, they breakdown the sale of the WNBA’s Atlanta Dream and the Wizard’s recent strong run. Also, they lookahead to some of the final games before the all-star break, including 76ers-Jazz and take a look at the dunk contest participants. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
